tr_quotes.quote: Kişi kendi gölgesi üzerinde durur ve neden karanlık olduğunu merak eder.
tr_quotes.author: Zen Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Öğretecek sadece üç şeyim var: sadelik, sabır, şefkat. Bu üçü en önemli hazinelerinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Güç fiziki kapasiteden değil boyun eğmeyen iradeden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Eğlenebilirken eğlen, zorunda kalınca katlan.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşam sanatı, vazgeçmek ve elinde tutmanın güzel karışımında gizlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz imkânsız durumlar olarak zekice kılık değiştiren muhteşem fırsatlar dizisiyle karşılaşırız.
tr_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

tr_quotes.quote: Sizi çökerten yük değil onu taşıdığınız yoldur.
tr_quotes.author: Lena Horne

tr_quotes.quote: Gökkuşağının olması için hem günışığına hem de yağmura ihtiyaç vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Dalgaları durduramazsın, ama sörf yapmayı öğrenebilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

tr_quotes.quote: Altında bulunduğum tek baskı, kendi üzerimde kurduğum baskıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Messier

tr_quotes.quote: Savaştığınız şey güçlenir ve direndiğiniz şey direnir.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Elmas, stresi son derece iyi idare edebilen sadece küçük bir parça kömürdür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğini düşünen insan yapabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu yönü, potansiyeli görün ve bir çaba gösterin.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Her düştüğünde, yerden bir şeyle kalk.
tr_quotes.author: Oswald Avery

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan ruhu ona acı verebilecek her şeyden daha güçlüdür.
tr_quotes.author: C.C. Scott

tr_quotes.quote: Gücümüz zayıflığımızdan doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Şefkat ve mutluluk güçsüzlüğün işareti değil gücün işaretidir.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Diğerlerinde gücü aramak çok daha değerlidir. Onların kusurlarını eleştirerek hiçbir şey kazanamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının içinde gördüklerimiz, kendi içimizdekiler kadardır.
tr_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

tr_quotes.quote: Ardımızda kalanlar ve önümüzde uzananlar, içimizde yatanlarla kıyaslandığında çok küçük kalırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Bir engel, basamak taşı da olabilir köstek de.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın zorlukları bizi daha iyi yapmak içindir, daha acı yapmak için değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ayrılıkta dünyanın en büyük ıstırabı, şefkatte ise dünyanın gerçek gücü yatar.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek mutluluk, koşullar ne olursa olsun, yenilmeyen güçlü bir ruhu oluşturmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

tr_quotes.quote: Bir tökezleme bir düşüşü engelleyebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel olan şey her zaman mükemmel değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüme, güçsüzlüklerimizi kabul etmeye başladığımızda başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Vanier

tr_quotes.quote: Gücümüz güçsüzlüklerimizden doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Daha iyi olmayı bırakan, iyi olmayı durdurmuş demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

tr_quotes.quote: Çoğunluk kuvveti kuvvetlerin en hoyratıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Bourget

tr_quotes.quote: Sevginin gücünün, gücün sevgisini geçersiz kıldığı gün, dünya barışı bilir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: En güçlü insanlar genellikle yalnızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Henrik İbsen

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kuvvet ötekine egemen olur ama hiçbiri ötekini oluşturmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Kadınların henüz öğrenemedikleri şey, kimsenin size güç vermemesidir. Gücü sadece sen alabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecekte umut varsa günümüzde güç vardır.
tr_quotes.author: John Maxwell

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olanın mutlaka haklı olması gerekmez.
tr_quotes.author: B.C. Leeming

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvetini iradesinden alana düşman yanaşamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Şehabeddin Ahmed

tr_quotes.quote: Bir başkasının gücünü tanımak, kendininkini azaltmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Joss Whedon

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi size güç verir ancak saygıyı karakterinizle kazanırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Gücün gücü dengelemediği yerde demokrasi olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: A. Taner Kışlalı

tr_quotes.quote: Güç insanı bozmuyor. Korku yozlaştırıyor.
tr_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

tr_quotes.quote: Sınırsız güç kafasız bir insanı felâkete sürükler.
tr_quotes.author: Guizot

tr_quotes.quote: En güçlü iki savaşçı, sabır ve zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Güç, sabır ile zamanın birleşimiyle elde edilir.
tr_quotes.author: H. de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Gücün olduğu yerde direniş vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Michel Foucault

tr_quotes.quote: Kolay hayatlar için dua etmeyin, daha güçlü insan olmak için dua edin.
tr_quotes.author: John Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi öldürmeyen her şey daha kuvvetli yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Alfred Musset

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi güç, zaman ise paradır.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Thier

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın özünü anlamak ister misiniz? O halde eline geniş kudret verin.
tr_quotes.author: Pittakus

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvete dayanmayan adalet aciz, adalete dayanmayan kuvvet zalimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünmeye zaman ayırın güçlü olmanın kaynağı budur
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gücüne eşit hayaller için dua etme. Hayallerine eşit güç için dua et.
tr_quotes.author: Michael Nolan

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlükler başarının değerini artıran süslerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Moliére

tr_quotes.quote: Güç erkeğe güzellik kadına verilmiş, her şeyi yenen güç güzelliğe yenilmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Y. Kadri Karaosmanoğlu

en_quotes.quote: Leadership is about vision and responsibility, not power
en_quotes.author: Seth Berkley

en_quotes.quote: Your dreams are what define your individuality. They have the power to give you wings and make you fly high
en_quotes.author: P. V. Sindhu

en_quotes.quote: Music has healing power. It has the ability to take people out of themselves for a few hours
en_quotes.author: Elton John

en_quotes.quote: Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless
en_quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

en_quotes.quote: Nation should be rest assured Pakistan is a safe atomic power. No one can cast an evil eye on it
en_quotes.author: Abdul Qadeer Khan

en_quotes.quote: Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality
en_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

en_quotes.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: Ah, summer, what power you have to make us suffer and like it
en_quotes.author: Russell Baker

en_quotes.quote: It is certain, in any case, that ignorance, allied with power, is the most ferocious enemy justice can have
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: We need money. We need hits. Hits bring money, money bring power, power bring fame, fame change the game
en_quotes.author: Young Thug

en_quotes.quote: Communism has never come to power in a country that was not disrupted by war or corruption, or both
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I have learned that there is more power in a good strong hug than in a thousand meaningful words
en_quotes.author: Ann Hood

en_quotes.quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language
en_quotes.author: Martin Buber

en_quotes.quote: We needed something to express our joy, our beauty, our power. And the rainbow did that
en_quotes.author: Gilbert Baker

en_quotes.quote: Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think
en_quotes.author: Robert Henri

en_quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of jealousy and the power of envy to destroy. Never underestimate that
en_quotes.author: Oliver Stone

en_quotes.quote: When every physical and mental resources is focused, one's power to solve a problem multiplies tremendously
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: Life has sweetness to it and a beauty and a power that I wanted to celebrate
en_quotes.author: Valerie Harper

en_quotes.quote: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading
en_quotes.author: David Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Every man builds his world in his own image. He has the power to choose, but no power to escape the necessity of choice
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: The power of community to create health is far greater than any physician, clinic or hospital
en_quotes.author: Mark Hyman

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is power
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword
en_quotes.author: John Ray

en_quotes.quote: Power tends to corrupt and absolute power corrupts absolutely
en_quotes.author: John Dalberg-Acton

en_quotes.quote: Mere goodness can achieve little against the power of nature
en_quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

en_quotes.quote: Silence is the ultimate weapon of power
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: You must never underestimate the power of the eyebrow
en_quotes.author: Jack Black

en_quotes.quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Girl power to me means being brave enough to take that first step and to speak out and be yourself
en_quotes.author: Katherine McNamara

en_quotes.quote: A king without power is an absurdity
en_quotes.author: James Monroe

en_quotes.quote: The paradox of trauma is that it has both the power to destroy and the power to transform and resurrect
en_quotes.author: Peter A. Levine

en_quotes.quote: The power of the white world is threatened whenever a black man refuses to accept the white world's definitions
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: All the waste in a year from a nuclear power plant can be stored under a desk
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Each consumer has the power of their wallet and their voice. They can exercise that
en_quotes.author: David Droga

en_quotes.quote: I'm keeping my power to myself and my glow. I'm not giving anybody my glow anymore
en_quotes.author: Jessica White

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the power of great clothing. It can evoke confidence, beauty, and a sense of glamour
en_quotes.author: Tina Knowles

en_quotes.quote: Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power
en_quotes.author: Rene Descartes

en_quotes.quote: I love the sounds and the power of pounding water, whether it is the waves or a waterfall
en_quotes.author: Mike May

en_quotes.quote: Self-reverence, self-knowledge, self-control; these three alone lead life to sovereign power
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: Every day alive in the 'Power' world is a beautiful day
en_quotes.author: Brandon Victor Dixon

en_quotes.quote: Rank does not confer privilege or give power. It imposes responsibility
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: I would encourage you: be informed - knowledge is power
en_quotes.author: Matt Bevin

en_quotes.quote: We all have so much more power to make our dreams a reality - and love life along the way - than we think we do!
en_quotes.author: Rachele Brooke Smith

en_quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of anyone's story... anyone's life
en_quotes.author: Abby Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I assess the power of a will by how much resistance, pain, torture it endures and knows how to turn to its advantage
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

en_quotes.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: One way to boost our will power and focus is to manage our distractions instead of letting them manage us
en_quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

en_quotes.quote: The rules have changed. True power is held by the person who possesses the largest bookshelf, not gun cabinet or wallet
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language
en_quotes.author: Marcus du Sautoy

en_quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of human stupidity
en_quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

en_quotes.quote: The longer I go on, the more I am aware of the power of finance
en_quotes.author: Justin Welby

en_quotes.quote: Whatever has happened to you in your past has no power over this present moment, because life is now
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: A lioness has got a lot more power than the lion likes to think she has
en_quotes.author: Jacki Weaver

en_quotes.quote: Nationalism is power hunger tempered by self-deception
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: I was taken by the power that savoring a simple cup of coffee can have to connect people and create community
en_quotes.author: Howard Schultz

en_quotes.quote: The reward of one duty is the power to fulfill another
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Great is the power of habit. It teaches us to bear fatigue and to despise wounds and pain
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: The subconscious doesn't distinguish sarcasm and jokes. It just accepts what it hears. That's the power of words
en_quotes.author: India Arie

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is power only if man knows what facts not to bother with
en_quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

en_quotes.quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all
en_quotes.author: Origen

en_quotes.quote: I feel like that nature has this great power
en_quotes.author: Jenova Chen

en_quotes.quote: We have, I fear, confused power with greatness
en_quotes.author: Stewart Udall

en_quotes.quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents
en_quotes.author: John W. Gardner

en_quotes.quote: I feel like knowledge is power: If you know how to take care of yourself, you can be a better version of yourself
en_quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

en_quotes.quote: What is interesting is the power and the impact of social media... So we must try to use social media in a good way
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: The law always limits every power it gives
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Vision without power does bring moral elevation but cannot give a lasting culture
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: I had rather excel others in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and dominion
en_quotes.author: Alexander the Great

en_quotes.quote: Arbitrary power is most easily established on the ruins of liberty abused to licentiousness
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the greatest asset you can possess, for it can take you further than money, power or influence
en_quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

en_quotes.quote: If you're looking for power and handling, then I think Ferrari is the answer
en_quotes.author: Sergio Marchionne

en_quotes.quote: All leaders must have some power. Without power, you can't be a leader
en_quotes.author: Mahathir Mohamad

en_quotes.quote: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: People are beginning to realize that education is power, that education is money, that education is an opportunity
en_quotes.author: Azim Premji

en_quotes.quote: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: In a republic this rule ought to be observed: that the majority should not have the predominant power
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: The more we deny that we have a dark side, the more power it has over us
en_quotes.author: Sheryl Lee

en_quotes.quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: The power of the ballot we need in sheer defense, else what shall save us from a second slavery?
en_quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

en_quotes.quote: Education is the power to think clearly, the power to act well in the worlds work, and the power to appreciate life
en_quotes.author: Brigham Young

en_quotes.quote: Being fit helps me improve my concentration, my will power and even my determination
en_quotes.author: Arjun Rampal

en_quotes.quote: Self-control is true power
en_quotes.author: Marco Pierre White

en_quotes.quote: The power of population is indefinitely greater than the power in the earth to produce subsistence for man
en_quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

en_quotes.quote: You will know that forgiveness has begun when you recall those who hurt you and feel the power to wish them well
en_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

en_quotes.quote: The only difference between the sane and the insane is that the sane have the power to lock up the insane
en_quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Nothing external to you has any power over you
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: The power of an air force is terrific when there is nothing to oppose it
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Liberty may be endangered by the abuse of liberty, but also by the abuse of power
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: What it lies in our power to do, it lies in our power not to do
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: What I fear most is power with impunity. I fear abuse of power, and the power to abuse
en_quotes.author: Isabel Allende

en_quotes.quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will
en_quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

en_quotes.quote: The struggle of man against power is the struggle of memory against forgetting
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct
en_quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

en_quotes.quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Power is like being a lady... if you have to tell people you are, you aren't
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Prestige is the shadow of money and power
en_quotes.author: C. Wright Mills

en_quotes.quote: Social acceptance, 'being liked,' has so much power because it holds the feelings of loneliness at bay
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: Innocence in genius, and candor in power, are both noble qualities
en_quotes.author: Madame de Stael

en_quotes.quote: The power of a close-up can be extraordinary, but you have to have actors who are able to reveal themselves
en_quotes.author: Phyllida Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: The highest proof of virtue is to possess boundless power without abusing it
en_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

en_quotes.quote: The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: But to me nothing - the negative, the empty - is exceedingly powerful
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Power has only one duty - to secure the social welfare of the People
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Power ought to serve as a check to power
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: A crown is merely a hat that lets the rain in
en_quotes.author: Frederick the Great

en_quotes.quote: If small things have the power to disturb you, then who you think you are is exactly that: small
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: The power lunch is no longer just for men. We all deserve a seat at the table
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: The pen and the written word hold a great deal of power
en_quotes.author: Andy Biersack

en_quotes.quote: Having power and being in a position of power can really blur your judgement, and it's not always that clear
en_quotes.author: Bob Morley

en_quotes.quote: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman
en_quotes.author: Chanakya

en_quotes.quote: Whenever you choose power over love, you will never find true happiness
en_quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

en_quotes.quote: It is more agreeable to have the power to give than to receive
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: There was a power outage at a department store yesterday. Twenty people were trapped on the escalators
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: Words have a lot of power
en_quotes.author: Juice Wrld

en_quotes.quote: There is more power in unity than division
en_quotes.author: Emanuel Cleaver

en_quotes.quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress
en_quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: There's a lack of people in power that are motivated by the idea of helping people
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: We have the power to make this the best generation of mankind in the history of the world or to make it the last
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it
en_quotes.author: W. H. Murray

en_quotes.quote: Power always thinks... that it is doing God's service when it is violating all his laws
en_quotes.author: John Adams

en_quotes.quote: Solar power is the last energy resource that isn't owned yet - nobody taxes the sun yet
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Raitt

en_quotes.quote: With power comes the abuse of power. And where there are bosses, there are crazy bosses. It's nothing new
en_quotes.author: Judd Rose

en_quotes.quote: The way of peace is the way of love. Love is the greatest power on earth. It conquers all things
en_quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

en_quotes.quote: Man's greatness lies in his power of thought
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Wherever there is interest and power to do wrong, wrong will generally be done
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: We can't afford not to educate girls and give women the power and the access that they need
en_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

en_quotes.quote: No man has received from nature the right to command his fellow human beings
en_quotes.author: Denis Diderot

en_quotes.quote: I couldn't have been a great goalkeeper without power, agility and quickness
en_quotes.author: Hope Solo

en_quotes.quote: Watch a child play, and you will see real power. They are fearless
en_quotes.author: Gray Scott

en_quotes.quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Words are power. And a book is full of words. Be careful what power you get from it. But know that you do
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: It's not the honors and not the titles and not the power that is of ultimate importance. It's what resides inside
en_quotes.author: Fred Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The people are the government, administering it by their agents; they are the government, the sovereign power
en_quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Something I learned very early on in my career is that there are a lot of things that you do not have any power over
en_quotes.author: Charlize Theron

en_quotes.quote: I was now resolved to do everything in my power to defeat the system
en_quotes.author: Oskar Schindler

en_quotes.quote: My duty is to call for free elections because there is an abuse of power, and we live in a dictatorship
en_quotes.author: Juan Guaido

en_quotes.quote: Leave no authority existing not responsible to the people
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Excessive fear is always powerless
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: It's easier to blame the person with less power
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Will power is to the mind like a strong blind man who carries on his shoulders a lame man who can see
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: A friend in power is a friend lost
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: Immense power is acquired by assuring yourself in your secret reveries that you were born to control affairs
en_quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of a simple tool
en_quotes.author: Craig Bruce

en_quotes.quote: Character is power
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: The greatest power is not money power, but political power
en_quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

en_quotes.quote: The power to mould the future of the Republic will be in the hands of the journalists of future generations
en_quotes.author: Joseph Pulitzer

en_quotes.quote: A nuclear power reactor is just a fancy way of boiling water
en_quotes.author: Leslie Dewan

en_quotes.quote: People have the power to redeem the work of fools
en_quotes.author: Patti Smith

en_quotes.quote: The secret of my influence has always been that it remained secret
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: What do I care about law? Ain't I got the power?
en_quotes.author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

en_quotes.quote: You have something unique that no one else has - your life experience. That's the power of you
en_quotes.author: Mel Robbins

en_quotes.quote: The superior power of population cannot be checked without producing misery or vice
en_quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

en_quotes.quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun
en_quotes.author: Robert Burton

en_quotes.quote: A typical smart phone has more computing power than Apollo 11 when it landed a man on the moon
en_quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

en_quotes.quote: We're forfeiting our power if we succumb to apathy
en_quotes.author: Camille Perri

en_quotes.quote: Power over a man's subsistence is power over his will
en_quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Power without a nation's confidence is nothing
en_quotes.author: Catherine the Great

en_quotes.quote: It's not possible for two countries to be the leading dominant political power at the same time
en_quotes.author: Fareed Zakaria

en_quotes.quote: Power corrupts, absolute power corrupts absolutely, and I found that out when I was Attorney General in Massachusetts
en_quotes.author: Edward Brooke

en_quotes.quote: Everything is generated through your own will power
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: I didn't want anyone to have control over how people saw me. I wanted to have that power myself
en_quotes.author: Indya Moore

en_quotes.quote: No one talks about woman power. The Spice Girls - they're masquerading as little girls. It's repulsive
en_quotes.author: Kim Gordon

en_quotes.quote: The way to have power is to take it
en_quotes.author: Boss Tweed

en_quotes.quote: Organizing gives workers the power to lift themselves out of poverty and build a better future
en_quotes.author: Eric Schneiderman

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot more power in calm than in vituperation
en_quotes.author: Dennis Prager

en_quotes.quote: If you want to be a woman in power, then empower other women
en_quotes.author: Nina Shaw

en_quotes.quote: What marks the artist is his power to shape the material of pain we all have
en_quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

en_quotes.quote: Circumstances are beyond human control, but our conduct is in our own power
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Do not put such unlimited power into the hands of husbands. Remember all men would be tyrants if they could
en_quotes.author: Abigail Adams

en_quotes.quote: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy
en_quotes.author: Meryl Streep

en_quotes.quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: The only real power comes out of a long rifle
en_quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

en_quotes.quote: The power of man has grown in every sphere, except over himself
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: Force always attracts men of low morality
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Power and speed be hands and feet
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The essence of Government is power; and power, lodged as it must be in human hands, will ever be liable to abuse
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: The blockchain symbolizes a shift in power from the centers to the edges of the networks
en_quotes.author: William Mougayar

en_quotes.quote: The power of accurate observation is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: What is good? All that heightens the feeling of power, the will to power, power itself in man
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: There is no power above people power
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: The point - the power to hurt - of all figures lies in the truthfulness of their application
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: The world itself is the will to power - and nothing else! And you yourself are the will to power - and nothing else!
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: People crushed by law have no hopes but from power. If laws are their enemies, they will be enemies to laws
en_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

en_quotes.quote: The revolutions of the Arab Spring happened because people realized they were the power
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: There is that in the glance of a flower which may at times control the greatest of creation's braggart lords
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: Unions are about the collective leverage, the power of numbers versus the power of capital
en_quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

en_quotes.quote: A pound invested in energy efficiency buys seven times more energy solution than a pound invested in nuclear power
en_quotes.author: Zac Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: One of the epidemics in our industry is the abuse of power
en_quotes.author: Nancy Dubuc

en_quotes.quote: It is folly for a man to pray to the gods for that which he has the power to obtain by himself
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: What I love most about icons is finding out what's behind them, exploring the price of their power
en_quotes.author: Joss Whedon

en_quotes.quote: Balk the enemy's power; force him to reveal himself
en_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing happens to any person but what was in his power to go through with
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: To live happily is an inward power of the soul
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Calmness is the cradle of power
en_quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

en_quotes.quote: Today knowledge has power. It controls access to opportunity and advancement
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: The power to do good is also the power to do harm
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Not the power to remember, but its very opposite, the power to forget, is a necessary condition for our existence
en_quotes.author: Saint Basil

en_quotes.quote: What are kings, when regiment is gone, but perfect shadows in a sunshine day?
en_quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

en_quotes.quote: I believe in God and the power of prayer
en_quotes.author: Kris Jenner

en_quotes.quote: I don't think people understand the power of social media or our phones
en_quotes.author: Zendaya

en_quotes.quote: Whatever my aims and agendas were, I never asked for power
en_quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is power, if you know it about the right person
en_quotes.author: Ethel Watts Mumford

en_quotes.quote: Power is not alluring to pure minds
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with her is that she lacks the power of conversation but not the power of speech
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: This is the power of fashion: the capability of allowing people to express themselves
en_quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

en_quotes.quote: People's blessings give you the power to work tirelessly. The only thing required is commitment
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: What connects two thousand years of genocide? Too much power in too few hands
en_quotes.author: Simon Wiesenthal

en_quotes.quote: With great power comes great responsibility. These are platforms with hundreds of millions of people
en_quotes.author: Dave McClure

en_quotes.quote: All gods are homemade, and it is we who pull their strings, and so, give them the power to pull ours
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: The expression of beauty is in direct ratio to the power of conception the artist has acquired
en_quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

en_quotes.quote: Because it was the original 4 guys, and the dynamic of those 4 guys interacting together that had the power
en_quotes.author: Ronnie Montrose

en_quotes.quote: All human laws are, properly speaking, only declaratory; they have no power over the substance of original justice
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Few men have virtue to withstand the highest bidder
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: It's the power of the brand. We've never formally advertised
en_quotes.author: Sara Blakely

en_quotes.quote: There is no power on earth that can neutralize the influence of a high, simple and useful life
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing about power is to make sure you don't have to use it
en_quotes.author: Edwin Land

en_quotes.quote: The point of power is always in the present moment
en_quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

en_quotes.quote: There are two kinds of women, those who want power in the world and those who want power in bed
en_quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Diplomacy: the art of restraining power
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: The advertisers who believe in the selling power of jingles have never had to sell anything
en_quotes.author: David Ogilvy

en_quotes.quote: One thing I hope I'll never be is drunk with my own power. And anybody who says I am will never work in this town again
en_quotes.author: Jim Carrey

en_quotes.quote: Every reign must submit to a greater reign
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Black Power is giving power to people who have not had power to determine their destiny
en_quotes.author: Huey Newton

en_quotes.quote: A true king is neither husband nor father; he considers his throne and nothing else
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: But the cause for which we fought was higher; our thought wider... That thought was our power
en_quotes.author: Joshua Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: Whoever is new to power is always harsh
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best
en_quotes.author: Edward Abbey

en_quotes.quote: Power is the great aphrodisiac
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: The power of the priesthood heals, protects, and inoculates all of the righteous against the powers of darkness
en_quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

en_quotes.quote: He who has great power should use it lightly
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: The eye sees what it brings the power to see
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: All the forces in the world are not so powerful as an idea whose time has come
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Love conquers all difficulties, surmounts all obstacles, and effects what to any other power would be impossible
en_quotes.author: William Godwin

en_quotes.quote: The greatest power is often simple patience
en_quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the power of ideas. I believe in the power of sharing knowledge
en_quotes.author: Ory Okolloh

en_quotes.quote: The bad man desires arbitrary power. What moves the evil man is the love of injustice
en_quotes.author: John Rawls

en_quotes.quote: Any form of art is a form of power; it has impact, it can affect change - it can not only move us, it makes us move
en_quotes.author: Ossie Davis

en_quotes.quote: The nation voted us to power to see unity and communal harmony, not for any division or communality
en_quotes.author: Khaleda Zia

en_quotes.quote: Men of power have no time to read; yet the men who do not read are unfit for power
en_quotes.author: Michael Foot

en_quotes.quote: People tend to see power carried out by conspiracy. It's easy to believe in
en_quotes.author: Alexander Mamut

en_quotes.quote: Only he deserves power who every day justifies it
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: He that fails in his endeavors after wealth or power will not long retain either honesty or courage
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Power is no blessing in itself, except when it is used to protect the innocent
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: There is no meaning to life except the meaning man gives his life by the unfolding of his powers
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: An alliance with a powerful person is never safe
en_quotes.author: Phaedrus

en_quotes.quote: What is genius but the power of expressing a new individuality?
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

en_quotes.quote: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun
en_quotes.author: William Glasser

en_quotes.quote: The power of noble deeds is to be preserved and passed on to the future
en_quotes.author: Joshua Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar
en_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

en_quotes.quote: Do not pray for tasks equal to your powers. Pray for powers equal to your tasks
en_quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

en_quotes.quote: I'm taking memory power boost tablets to help me every day and doing the puzzles to help me stay focused
en_quotes.author: Terry Bradshaw

en_quotes.quote: Power, after love, is the first source of happiness
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: Our public figures are often narcissists, utterly self-absorbed in their quest for power
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Kristof

en_quotes.quote: Merely that I have a World Wide Web page does not give me any power, any abilities, nor any status in the real world
en_quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

en_quotes.quote: Long-term sustainable change happens if people discover their own power
en_quotes.author: Pierre Omidyar

en_quotes.quote: Power doesn't corrupt people, people corrupt power
en_quotes.author: William Gaddis

en_quotes.quote: Unlimited power corrupts the possessor
en_quotes.author: William Pitt

en_quotes.quote: I love the healing power of crystals
en_quotes.author: Wendi McLendon-Covey

en_quotes.quote: I believe the gun has no power at all
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Nobody is as powerful as we make them out to be
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: There is something about inside information which seems to paralyse a man's reasoning powers
en_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

en_quotes.quote: Vote: the instrument and symbol of a freeman's power to make a fool of himself and a wreck of his country
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: It is by its promise of a sense of power that evil often attracts the weak
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: The power of daring anything their fancy suggest, as always been conceded to the painter and the poet
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: Power is the most persuasive rhetoric
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: No emperor has the power to dictate to the heart
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: Getting and spending, we lay waste our powers
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: Power is dangerous unless you have humility
en_quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

en_quotes.quote: A man's true state of power and riches is to be in himself
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of getting power is to be able to give it away
en_quotes.author: Aneurin Bevan

en_quotes.quote: No matter what has happened, you too have the power to enjoy yourself
en_quotes.author: Allen Klein

en_quotes.quote: The memory, experiencing and re-experiencing, has such power over one's mere personal life, that one has merely lived
en_quotes.author: Rebecca West

en_quotes.quote: Women are standing up and leaning forward and asserting their power
en_quotes.author: Lynn Nottage

en_quotes.quote: Money has power. And so withholding money has power too, especially when a bunch of people do it together
en_quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

en_quotes.quote: Never forget that the most powerful force on earth is love
en_quotes.author: Nelson Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: The only power you have is the word no
en_quotes.author: Frances McDormand

en_quotes.quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected
en_quotes.author: William Plomer

en_quotes.quote: Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor
en_quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

en_quotes.quote: We simply need to believe in the power that's within us, and use it
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

en_quotes.quote: Some coaches are on power trips. I've never needed somebody to tell me I'm not working hard enough
en_quotes.author: Mark Warkentin

en_quotes.quote: It's not that we poor men are so powerful to be able to banish the devil. It's that God gives us the power
en_quotes.author: Gabriele Nanni

en_quotes.quote: Ambition is the immoderate desire for power
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: Our sense of power is more vivid when we break a man's spirit than when we win his heart
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Arbitrary power is like most other things which are very hard, very liable to be broken
en_quotes.author: Abigail Adams

en_quotes.quote: Order is power
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: I cured with the power that came through me
en_quotes.author: Black Elk

en_quotes.quote: Sooner or later, man has always had to decide whether he worships his own power or the power of God
en_quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

en_quotes.quote: Moral power is probably best when it is not used. The less you use it the more you have
en_quotes.author: Andrew Young

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is the most democratic source of power
en_quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

en_quotes.quote: There is no force so powerful as an idea whose time has come
en_quotes.author: Everett Dirksen

en_quotes.quote: Throughout history, great leaders have known the power of humor
en_quotes.author: Allen Klein

en_quotes.quote: Authority must be respected and chosen wisely
en_quotes.author: Lech Walesa

en_quotes.quote: Politics is not about power
en_quotes.author: Paul Wellstone

en_quotes.quote: Whoever wants peace among nations must seek to limit the state and its influence most strictly
en_quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

en_quotes.quote: The real problem is that the way that power is given out in our society pits us against each other
en_quotes.author: Anita Hill

en_quotes.quote: Politicians have limited power. They can't impose morality on themselves. How can they impose it on the country?
en_quotes.author: Cal Thomas

en_quotes.quote: Each underestimates her own power and overestimates the other's
en_quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

en_quotes.quote: Power in America today is control of the means of communication
en_quotes.author: Theodore White

en_quotes.quote: Ironically, women who acquire power are more likely to be criticized for it than are the men who have always had it
en_quotes.author: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun

en_quotes.quote: Every crisis offers you extra desired power
en_quotes.author: William Moulton Marston

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the power of weakness
en_quotes.author: Pat Buckley

en_quotes.quote: Power is paradoxical
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

en_quotes.quote: People who are in power make their arrangements in secret, largely as a way of maintaining and furthering that power
en_quotes.author: Don DeLillo

en_quotes.quote: People who are powerless make an open theater of violence
en_quotes.author: Don DeLillo

en_quotes.quote: Sir, I am no sycophant or worshipper of power anywhere
en_quotes.author: Benjamin F. Wade

en_quotes.quote: The power of the people and the power of reason are one
en_quotes.author: Georg Buchner

en_quotes.quote: America has a critical role to play as the most powerful member of the world community
en_quotes.author: Adam Schiff

en_quotes.quote: The law has no power over heroes
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Lennox
